value.name: John Clark Catches Up with the Sixers Fan/Urologist Who Flipped Russell Westbrook the Double Birds
value.description: At Crossing Broad, we believe that the Sixers fan who flipped Russell Westbrook the double birds deserves to ring the bell at a playoff game. His name is Richard Harkaway, and he’s actually a urologist.
